snippet.title: Total War™: ATTILA – Viking Forefathers Culture Pack – Pre-order bonus (Official Trailer)
snippet.description:
Pre-order and receive Total War: ATTILA’s first DLC for free!
The Viking Forefathers Culture Pack, adds three new playable factions to the game: The Danes, The Jutes and The Geats. 
These warlike Norse factions have their own unique battlefield and naval units, missions, cultural and factional traits, and are poised to launch southwards from their icy homelands on campaigns of raiding, looting and conquest.
